text: Joe Morgenstern (born October 3, 1932) is an American Pulitzer Prize-winning movie critic, historian, and journalist for the Wall Street Journal. He was born in Matamoras.imdb.com/name/nm0605156/bio Internet Movie Database, page for Joe Morgenstern, accessed 18 Sept. 2009 He was raised in New York City, New York. He studied at Lehigh University. He was married to Piper Laurie from 1962 until they divorced in 1982. They had one daughter.
